SEARCH
Package com.github.kaepsis

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
com.github.kaepsis.Chat
public class Chat extends Object
Utility class for managing chat formatting, color codes, and sending messages in a Bukkit-based environment. Supports both legacy color codes and modern hex colors using the format &#RRGGBB. Implemented as a singleton.

    • color

      public String color(String message)
      Translates legacy color codes (&) and hex color codes (e.g., &#FF00FF) in a given message string.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to colorize.
      Returns:
      The colored message ready to be sent to players.

    • removeColors

      public String removeColors(String message)
      Removes all legacy and hex color codes from the given message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to sanitize.
      Returns:
      The message without any color formatting.

    • send

      public void send(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender receiver, String message, Object... placeholders)
      Sends a formatted message to the given CommandSender, applying placeholder replacements.
      Parameters:
      receiver - The command sender (player, console, etc.)
      message - The message to send.
      placeholders - Optional placeholder-value pairs for formatting.

    • send

      public void send(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String message)
      Sends a message to the given CommandSender after applying color codes.
      Parameters:
      sender - The command sender to send the message to.
      message - The message to send.

    • format

      public String format(String message, Object... placeholders)
      Replaces placeholders in a string. Expects pairs of [placeholder, replacement, ...].
      Parameters:
      message - The message containing placeholders.
      placeholders - An array of placeholder-value pairs.
      Returns:
      The formatted message with replacements applied.

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast(String message, @Nullable String permission, @Nullable Object... placeholders)
      Broadcasts a message to all online players, optionally filtered by permission.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to broadcast.
      permission - The permission required to receive the message, or null to send to all players.
      placeholders - Optional placeholder-value pairs for formatting the message.

    • formatList

      public ArrayList<String> formatList(List<String> list, Object... placeholders)
      Formats a list of strings by applying placeholder replacements.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of strings to format.
      placeholders - Placeholder-value pairs.
      Returns:
      A new list with all lines formatted.

    • colorList

      public ArrayList<String> colorList(List<String> list)
      Applies color codes to all strings in the given list.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of strings to colorize.
      Returns:
      A new list with all lines colorized.
